Now Scenario 2: "To make money, I make jewelry out of trash and sell it to people." This seems more problematic.
Making jewelry from trash and selling it.

Well, in 2020, the US has environmental concerns.
Using trash as materials might be seen as irresponsible or unethical if it's not properly recycled or if it's harmful.
